name: 語意學研討
comment: 教室位於雲和街大樓2樓（地址：雲和街1號），外系及外校學生需申請門禁權限。
goals: students should be able to understand the main ideas behind the theory and also to read and analyze Minimalist articles critically
syllabus:
**Course Description**

This course aims to discuss semantic issues related to generative lexicon, scalarity, aspectuality, transtivity, resultatives, etc. to give students more advanced knowledge of semantics.

**tentative schedule:**

**week 1** introduction

**week 2**  Introduction to Generative Lexicon

**week 3**  Qualia modification: N-N compounds (Lee et al. 2010), Wei (Chou & Hsieh 2013) 

**week 4**  Scale: Tenny 1995

**week 5**  Scale: Kennedy & McNally 2005

**week 6**  Modality and scale: Verstraete 2005 

**week 7**  Aspect and scale: Peck et al. 2013

**week 8**  Aspect: Depraetere 1995; Aspect: Klein 2000 

**week 9** Aspect: Klein 2000; Resultative: Basciano 2010, ch.5, pp.251-311

**week 10** Resultative: Basciano 2010, ch.5, pp.251-311

**week 11**   individual conference and  term paper outline discussion

**week 12** Transitivity: Hopper & Thompson 1980; Transitivity :Tsunoda 1985

**week 13**  Transitivity: Liu 1999

**week 14**  Primus 2016 Participant Roles

**week 15**  term paper writing

**week 16**  term paper presentation

**Dec. 31**    term paper due
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
